item.description:
So January's event was a great success! Let's continue the great tradition of pot-luck food and fun social times!

This was such a hit last year that we've decided to again have a game night and party each month during the winter (and this is the LAST of 3 for this winter). This helps break up the long nights and to socialize with lots of fun! This event will be held at Janice's condo complex clubhouse in South Windsor. There will be a large fireplace with fire, music, tables & chairs, bathrooms, and full kitchen available.

Food:

Supplied already:
* Paper and serving products

Please plan to bring to share any of:
* Small entree (plan to feed 8 people!)
* Drinks
* Finger food
* Snacks

Games:

Some of the games we have already:
* Pictionary
* Picture Picture
* Worst Case Scenario
* Trivial Pursuit
* Scrabble
* Fact or Crap
* Jenga (well a knockoff version)

We'd like to see someone bring these as well as anything else:
* Bolderdash
* Cranium
* Cards (for various card games)

Bring any other game you might think 4 - 6 people at least could play at the same time. Team games would be great too. Note this is an indoor game night. We are not doing horseshoes or lawn darts!

Hall Rental Donation
We would appreciate donations of any amount (maybe $5 each person?) to help offset the cost of the hall rental. Donations can be made at the event.

This is at a hall at a condo complex in South Windsor. The address will be sent to those who respond "Yes" about a couple days before the event. If you sign up last minute be sure to e-mail Janice or Kevin for directions. Limitation on RSVP's is due to parking limitations. We all hope you can attend and enjoy a warm evening with great people.

Last year this was a hit with over 60 people going each time and people brought great food and drinks to share! The next and last Game Night and Party of the season will be Feb. 12th.

If you RSVP "yes" and later can't go, please remember to change your RSVP so someone else can go!!

item.name: Winter Game Night and a Nod to Valentine's Day
